algorithms.co_training

Class ClassifiedInstancesQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.co_training.ClassifiedInstancesQueue

  • public class ClassifiedInstancesQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the list of classified instances (ClassifiedInstance objects) sorted descending by classification confidence. The list can only contain the predefined number of most confidently classified instances.

    Used in co-training to allow each classifier to select and label a predefined number of unlabeled instances for which it is most confident about the prediction. For example, according the notation used in
    A. Blum, T. Mitchell, "Combining labeled and unlabeled data with co-training", COLT: Proceedings of the Workshop on Computational Learning Theory, Morgan Kaufmann, 1998, p. 92-100.
    in each iteration of co-training we would use one ClassifiedInstancesQueue of capacity p for the positively labeled examples and one ClassifiedInstancesQueue of the capacity n for the negatively labeled examples

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassifiedInstancesQueue

        public ClassifiedInstancesQueue(int capacity)
        Creates a new ClassifiedInstancesQueue with the given capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - maximal number of instances that can be in the list

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(ClassifiedInstance newInstance)
        Attempts to add another classified instance to the list. The classified instance is added in the fashion that maintains the ordering of the classified instances (descending, based on prediction confidence)

        1. If the list is full to its capacity an instance will be added if it is more confidently labeled then the last (least confident) member of the classified instances list. The previous last member of the list will be removed
        2. If the current size of the list is lower than its capacity the instance will be added to the list

        Parameters:
        newInstance - the instance to be added

      • getList

        public java.util.List<ClassifiedInstance> getList()
        Returns the sorted list of classified instances
        Returns:
        the sorted list of classified instances (descending by classification confidence)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the list of instances in the priority queue as String
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String that represents the list of classified instances currently in the queue
